overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto's social media presence is robust across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers and active engagement in topics related to social media analysis, disinformation, and computational methods. Engagement levels vary across platforms, with LinkedIn showing high interaction through likes and comments.

contentThemes.description: Discussions on methodological approaches to studying disinformation across platforms.
Updates about new research papers, grants, and project developments.
Posts about hiring for research positions and new research opportunities.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on Bluesky to leverage its high engagement potential.
Engage more with followers by replying to comments and encouraging discussion.

platformInsights.mastodon: Posts on Mastodon receive moderate engagement, indicating a dedicated but smaller audience.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn posts have the highest engagement, with significant likes and comments, suggesting a professional audience interested in research and job opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
